description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

describedBy.description: The JSON Schema used for this object.

id.description: The 'logical' identifier of the entity in the repository, e.g. a UUID.  This 'id' is unique within a given system. The identified entity may have a different 'id' in a different system.

identifier.description: A 'business' identifier  or accession number for the entity, typically as provided by an external system or authority, that persists across implementing systems.

label.description: Short name or abbreviation for project. Maps to rdfs:label.

disease_site.description: A list of the text terms used to describe the primary site of disease.

disease_type.description: A list of the text terms used to describe the type of malignant disease.

dbgap_accession.description: The link to the dbgap accession record for data associated with this Project. For MVP, will model this as a string, but this could be modeled as an external reference.

program.description: The text term used to describe the parent program for this project.

studies.description: List of studies associated with this Project. For POC, using this model instead of Identifier due to confusion over type CodeableConcept; reconsider for MVP.

dct:title.description: Official project name. Maps to dct:title.

title: Project
